Power to generate change.

As an industry leader, we aspire to drive the shift toward intelligent, eco-friendly infrastructure that not only protects but strengthens communities, industries, and natural resources alike.

Our Offerings
About Us

Sustainable distributed energy infrastructure that powers Australia's clean energy future.

We are leading Australia's transition to clean energy through investment in practical, engineered infrastructure — co-located at property assets and delivered with clarity, control, and no compromises.

Who We Are

Energy Bay is Australia’s sustainable energy infrastructure partner.

Established in 2016, Energy Bay was founded to accelerate Australia’s energy transition. With deep expertise in Distributed Energy Resources (DER), we deliver tailored energy infrastructure solutions that help enterprises navigate complexity with confidence. By merging innovation with impact, we’re driving Australia's shift toward a more sustainable, resilient energy future.

Born from deep industry experience, we set out to do things differently — to design, integrate and orchestrate systems that deliver scalable, sustainable outcomes. Not just for now, but for the long term.

Read More
Our Offerings
01.

Embedded Networks

Empowering businesses with private energy networks designed to support scalable, distributed energy infrastructure.

02.

Power Purchase Agreements

On-site renewable energy infrastructure tailored to your business, delivering reliable, low-cost electricity. We design, install, own, and operate advanced energy technologies that seamlessly integrate with your operations.

03.

Community Energy Networks

Community Energy Networks designed for residential communities and strata developments, enabling seamless integration of shared energy infrastructure.

Recent Projects
01.

Moorebank Logistics Park

Moorebank Logistics Park is one of the largest embedded network precincts in Australia. The site is currently under construction with up to 60MW of rooftop solar, and 30MVA of BESS planned.

Power Purchase Agreements

One of the largest regional retail centres between Maroochydore and Mackay, it has more than 150 specialty stores inside the embedded network.
